website_summaries.verdict: A thick CC cream that effectively covers fine lines and wrinkles.
pros: Smooths over fine lines and wrinkles without settling into them
Thick, creamy formula provides light coverage and goes on smoothly
Sits at a reasonable price point
cons: Has a heavier feel than most CC creams

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have used this product for several years without any problems. It gives light coverage, mostly just smoothing out my skin tone, and never looks cakey or fake. I like that his has SPF, but when I'm going to be in the sun more than just walking to my car, I do use a mineral sunscreen with a higher SPF under this.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Revlon products but was disappointed in the CC cream. I feel the product is oily and has a scent I do not like
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: The second time I shaken the bottle pretty well before squeezing the product and notice that the ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle and label looks very old. The first time I squeezed the bottle all that came out was oily liquids. The second time I shaken the bottle pretty well before squeezing the product and notice that the product came out looking expired/old, what I mean is the oily liquid and the CC cream separates... not sure if it’s supposed to be looking like that. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite foundation. I can't say enough good things about this. It goes on so smoothly and doesn't look cakey at all. Excellent coverage. I wish Revlon still made it. It's so hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Renae F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer wear
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy coverage by any means, but it serves as a moisturizer and light coverage for hot summer days. It seems very oily but after it is applied, it absorbs into my skin very well.

customer_reviews.title: Good formula, color is tricky
customer_reviews.text: I like the formula a lot. It corrects and has spf. Doesnt break me out. However, its way too dark for me. I was hoping light/medium meant it works for skin tones within that range but the shade is literally in the middle of light and medium so it would only work for someone who is that shade. My summer shade is 115 in maybelline fit me and I have to add a lighter foundation to make this work for me. I'll finish the bottle but won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lgirl

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the new Revlon product
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy to find this product online, because I couldn't find it at retail stores. I suspect the product I purchased online is rather old! It seems that no matter how much I shake it before opening it, it's separated into liquid and solid when I open the tube. Although it blends back together when I smooth it onto my skin, I'll switch to the newer Age Defying Foundation also made by Revlon.

customer_reviews.title: Great natural look
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a makeup base /foundation with nothing else. It gives a nice sheen and last for a long time. I am disappointed that you can no longer purchase this at the local outlets........not sure why Revlon discontinues product that are so good..................The lipstick I used for years is also ;unable to be purchased anywhere but on line........
